event.title: was established by Lady Anderson in about 1814

data.event: The school was established by Lady Anderson in about 1814, and the current building was built as a Church of England (Aided) school in 1966.

event.title: was built as a Church of England (Aided) school in 1966

data.event: The school was established by Lady Anderson in about 1814, and the current building was built as a Church of England (Aided) school in 1966.
